creator: vlsergey@gmail.com

text:
AsyncAppender has been substantially reworked in the SVN (both trunk and 1.2 branch) which eliminated 
several classes of potential deadlocks.  Could you confirm that the problem persists with the current code 
or later releases.
creator: carnold@apache.org

text: I believe fixed in log4j 1.2.14.  Marking as WORKSFORME.
creator: carnold@apache.org
